text: The Asphalt Jungle is a 1950 American crime movie directed by John Huston and was based on the 1949 novel of the same name by W. R. Burnett. It stars Sterling Hayden, Louis Calhern, Jean Hagen, James Whitmore, Marc Lawrence, Marilyn Monroe, Anthony Caruso, Barry Kelley and was distributed by Metro- Goldwyn-Mayer. It was nominated for 4 Academy Awards in 1951. ==References== ==Other websites== * * * * * Category:1950 movies Category:1950 crime movies Category:American crime movies Category:Movies based on books Category:American heist movies Category:Film noir Category:Movies set in Ohio Category:Suicide in movies Category:Movies directed by John Huston
title: The Asphalt Jungle
